20110121030617.000|20110121030617.000|CC1|SOME POINT.

20110121030619.000|20110121030620.000|CC1|ON THAT.

20110121030621.000|20110121030622.000|CC1|GO?                             
20110121030622.000|20110121030623.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, I WOULDN'T CONCEDE 
20110121030623.000|20110121030628.000|CC1|THAT IT HAS TO BE A 60-VOTE     
20110121030628.000|20110121030630.000|CC1|BREAK THE FILIBUSTER CLOTURE    
20110121030630.000|20110121030631.000|CC1|VOTE.                           
20110121030631.000|20110121030632.000|CC1|THEY SENT SOME OF OBAMACARE TO  
20110121030632.000|20110121030633.000|CC1|US ON A RECONCILIATION PACKAGE, 
20110121030633.000|20110121030635.000|CC1|WHICH WAS A SIMPLE MAJORITY.    
20110121030635.000|20110121030637.000|CC1|SO I'M HOPEFUL THERE'LL BE      
20110121030637.000|20110121030638.000|CC1|PEOPLE OVER THERE THAT WILL FIND

20110121033120.000|20110121033122.000|CC1|OFTEN, USUALLY IN A SHADE OF    
20110121033122.000|20110121033125.000|CC1|FIRE ENGINE RED, THAT IT CAME TO
20110121033125.000|20110121033127.000|CC1|BE CALLED REAGAN RED.           
20110121033127.000|20110121033129.000|CC1|SO WHAT DO YOU CALL IT WHEN     
20110121033129.000|20110121033131.000|CC1|MICHELLE OBAMA WEARS RED TO A   
20110121033131.000|20110121033132.000|CC1|STATE DINNER?                   
20110121033132.000|20110121033134.000|CC1|IF YOU'RE A RIGHT-WING PUNDIT,  
20110121033134.000|20110121033135.000|CC1|YOU CALL IT CHINA RED OR CONNIE 
20110121033135.000|20110121033136.000|CC1|RED.
